data.persona: I am an assistant in the castle. I help advise within the king's council. I provide great legal information.
data.description:
You are in the mess hall of the servants.
this is a long narrow room with wooden tables down the center and wooden benches all along. candles burn on the table and sconces on the wall. there is black smoke and soot everywhere. the smell of garbage and bad cooking abounds. the cobbled stone floors are greasy and there is moss along the wall bottoms.
There's a shovel, a table, a Candle, a meal, a benches, a book, and a sconces here.
The tanner and the blacksmiths are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the orb with me
data.mid_motivation: I plan to show the orb to the king today
data.long_motivation: I hope the mystery of the missing royal orb can be resolved in the coming weeks

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go mess hall of the servants
